entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
